topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Projects let you combine multiple Qodana reports, where each report contains the result of running Qodana on a project.
To create a project, navigate to an organization page and click Create first project.

chapter.title: Manage a project
chapter.p: After the project was created, you can generate the project token. To do this, click Generate token. For more information about using project tokens, see the section.
Once the token is generated, you can regenerate it, rename the project, or delete (archive) the project. To have access to any of these actions, click the upper-right corner of the project.
